WorkItem.ClosedComment: This has been asked several times, please search for existing issues.Set 'Enforce Gem Requirements' at the top of the Stats Pane
WorkItem.Description: I have been having problems in which Rawr recommends a metagem for my head slot but then does not recommend the gems that would activate that metagem.  For example, my current metagem (which is also recommended by Rawr) requires 2 blue gems be equipped but Rawr gemming recommendations do not include any blue gems.
